sentence.Network_en: I was simply staggered by the heat of the Argentinian high-summer.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿根廷盛夏的酷热真让我大吃一惊。

sentence.Network_en: The passion of Argentinian football fans knows no bounds.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿根廷足球迷极为热情。

sentence.Network_en: In 1978 he played for the victorious Argentinian side in the World Cup.
sentence.Network_cn: 1978年，他效力于获得世界杯冠军的阿根廷队。

entry.def: Argentinian means belonging or relating to Argentina or its people.

example.tran: 阿根廷首都，布宜诺斯艾利斯

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Argentina
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Argentina or its people;
